titleStmt.title: An abstract by way of index of some very unsound and some other very antichristian passages collected out of G. Whitehead's and W. Penns books, plainly contradicting their late creeds one signed by W. Penn at Dublin in Ireland on which the B. of Cork hath made some seasonable remarks, another signed by G.W., called A few positions of the sincere belief and Christian

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and are to be sold by B. Aylmer ... and C. Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
